message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000.  Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, $20000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $15000. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $15000 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down a bit to $17500 to make this deal work.  This reflects the unique value of the product.  Let's find a solution that benefits both of us.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $17500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $16000. If we can agree on that, I'm ready to finalize the deal.
